column1: Uchi////Not often that I give such a well know (in Austin) named restaurant such a bad review
column2: but tonight was absolutely horrendous. Not sure I'd hold more accountable the restaurant or the waitress
column3: but it sucked. "Uchi" is very proud of their legendary name from Austin
column4: and are always packed in Houston
column5: so we were excited about getting a 7:30 table here. Unfortunately it took us 45 minutes to get 4 plates
column6: and one trip to our table from our waitress. Â
